title: Hancock (the movie)
content:
I want to think I know what this is, but I just can’t come up with the name.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [hancock.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821122439/http:/typophile.com/files/hancock.jpg) | 90.38 KB |

 [‹ what's this font? I have seen it lots before, but cant remember the name......](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821122439/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45133 "Go to previous forum topic") [sci-fi/techno ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821122439/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45120 "Go to next forum topic")
author: armin

comments.content: I thought it was [Rodchenko](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821122439/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/rodchenko-cond/), but the A is wrong.
[Bank Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821122439/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/bank-gothic/) is the one I was thinking... But that’s not it either.
